about_the_game:
You are a retired anti-corruption Assassin for the mainframe '5eus'. However, upon reading the news one day, you notice something odd. The mainframe appears to be behaving strangely, allegedly taking over planets in far quadrants for selfish purposes by sending electrical probes into the atmosphere, disabling all living creatures. This all began on planet ‘Apollis’ where many of the inhabitants are missing. Patrolling AI drones have been spotted roaming around the '6aia gem' mines, a major fuel source for the universe. Assassin leaves retirement and reboots the original directive: Remove Corrupted Files. Find the source of the corruption and restore order to the universe, one planet at a time.

- Range of weapons, grenades and powerups

- Upgrade abilities

- Responsive enemy AI with ragdoll physics (recently upgraded)

- Mine resources and use them for crafting supplies

- Jetpack and double jump to reach tough spots

Much more to come as we continue development.

content_descriptors.notes: Side Scrolling gunplay and some fictional violence toward non-human enemies. Humanoid or metal robots, mechs and some plants.

detailed_description:
Updated May 2024!

After a total reboot of the project, we are happy to announce Lost Assassin: A Tale of AI Corruption is available in it's newest form. You will find a raft of changes. Check out the Dev Logs for more info.


About the Game

You are a retired anti-corruption Assassin for the mainframe '5eus'. However, upon reading the news one day, you notice something odd. The mainframe appears to be behaving strangely, allegedly taking over planets in far quadrants for selfish purposes by sending electrical probes into the atmosphere, disabling all living creatures. This all began on planet ‘Apollis’ where many of the inhabitants are missing. Patrolling AI drones have been spotted roaming around the '6aia gem' mines, a major fuel source for the universe. Assassin leaves retirement and reboots the original directive: Remove Corrupted Files. Find the source of the corruption and restore order to the universe, one planet at a time. - Range of weapons, grenades and powerups - Upgrade abilities - Responsive enemy AI with ragdoll physics (recently upgraded) - Mine resources and use them for crafting supplies - Jetpack and double jump to reach tough spots Much more to come as we continue development.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later.
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core or similar.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 500 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6GHz or similar.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 700 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: (Updated May 2024 Loads of improvements) - 2D Side-Scrolling Action Shooter. The Assassin has a wide range of weapons, jetpack, mining, ragdoll physics. All original hand crafted artwork. Explore maze like levels with interactive elements and mine resources to buy and craft supplies.
